name: superagent-get-chunked
description: Adds support to the superagent library for chunked-transfer encoded responses when in the browser.

scripts.build: npm run compile && npm run compress
scripts.compile:main: browserify index.js -o ./test/browser/superagent-get-chunked.js && echo 'onmessage = function(e) {' > ./test/browser/superagent-get-chunked-worker.js && browserify ./superagent-worker-body.js >> ./test/browser/superagent-get-chunked-worker.js && echo '};' >> ./test/browser/superagent-get-chunked-worker.js && cp ./test/browser/superagent-get-chunked-worker.js ./test/browser/superagent-get-chunked-worker.min.js
scripts.installCustomChunkedRequest: cd ./node_modules && rm -rf ./chunked-request && git clone https://github.com/ariutta/chunked-request.git && cd ./chunked-request && npm install && npm run prepublish && cd ../..
scripts.size: browserify -g uglifyify ./size.js --standalone size | uglifyjs -c -o ./size.bundle.js && ls -lh | grep 'size.bundle.js' && rm ./size.bundle.js
scripts.start: echo 'Once build finishes, visit http://localhost:8080' && npm run build && cd ./test/browser && http-server

author: Anders Riutta
